trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_SEQ_00<tab>Jullus finds himself in the somewhat bizarre position of leading ambassadors of an enemy contingent on a salvage mission.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Alisaie.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_TODO_01<tab>Search for ceruleum in Forum Solius.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Jullus.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_TODO_03<tab>Search for ceruleum at the designated location.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_TODO_04<tab>Deliver the temperature regulator ceruleum tank to Jullus.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_ALPHINAUD_000_000<tab>Although this is hardly the solution we had in mind, it will have to suffice for the time being.

TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>Without our healing magicks, there's little we can do for these people beyond offer words of encouragement. But this way we'll be able to offer them tangible assistance.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_010<tab>We will begin our search for ceruleum in Regio Urbanissima.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_011<tab>The first location is Forum Solius, a park to the northwest of this station.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_012<tab>You are to remain close at all times and act only as ordered. Follow me.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_ALPHINAUD_000_020<tab>To think this macabre graveyard for warmachina was once a park...
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_025<tab>This is the place.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_ALISAIE_000_030<tab>So, this is the park... I'm surprised they found space for one amongst all these buildings.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_031<tab>Actually, the recreational areas came first. The houses were later built around them.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_032<tab>"A healthy society requires communal spaces for children to play, and adults to socialize.“
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_033<tab>This park was named after the founding father of the Empire, the great Solus zos Galvus.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_ALPHINAUD_000_034<tab>Did we come to extract ceruleum from the wrecked magitek armor?
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_035<tab>No, we've already drained it dry. Same goes for the rest of the machina in the vicinity.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_036<tab>But as our ceruleum has been stolen, we must scour the city for every last drop.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_037<tab>And while I don't expect to find anything here, I've decided to try one more time, in case something has been overlooked.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_ALPHINAUD_000_038<tab>I see. Then with your permission, we will commence the search.

TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_ALPHINAUD_000_040<tab>I don't imagine there would be much need for magitek in a park of all places, but then again, I wasn't raised in Garlemald. They may have uses for ceruleum that I've yet to consider.

TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_ALISAIE_000_045<tab>This...whatever-it-is appears to have some sort of symbolic meaning relating to this park. Even though the place is named after Solus, it doesn't seem to be a statue of him. Well, at least not anymore.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_ALISAIE_000_046<tab>Maybe it was once a fountain? Or somewhere the man himself used to sit? Not that it would matter, even if we knew, but I can't help wondering.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_050<tab>...
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>Jullus ignores you as he stares at the water in silence, as if searching for something he knows has gone and will never return...
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>Though rather small by Garlean standards, the structure is reminiscent of a merchant's stall. Perhaps it was built for children to play at shopkeeper.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_SYSTEM_000_061<tab>There is nothing inside resembling magitek or any other devices that would be fueled by ceruleum...

TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_SYSTEM_000_065<tab>Several points of interest are marked on the map of Forum Solius. The pond, children's play areas... To your knowledge, however, none would require the use of ceruleum.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_SYSTEM_000_070<tab>A cursory inspection of the wrecked magitek armor confirms that the fuel canisters have long since been drained of ceruleum, as Jullus said.

TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_SYSTEM_000_075<tab>The contraption is built in the style of imperial warmachina armed with a battery of weapons and capable of transforming into different configurations...but on closer inspection, it appears to be no more than a children's slide.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_080<tab>Oh, it's you. Any luck?
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_ALPHINAUD_000_081<tab>There's no sign of any ceruleum.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_082<tab>Hmm... Hardly surprising, but disappointing nonetheless.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_ALISAIE_000_083<tab>I couldn't help noticing you gazing at the pond. Is something the matter?
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_084<tab>What? Yes─ I mean, no, I'm...
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_085<tab>It's just...I used to bring my brother and sister here to play.

TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_086<tab>The pond was heated to stop it from freezing over, so like all the other children, they just had to wade in and splash about. Would've stayed there if I didn't drag them out. We'd be sopping wet when all was said and done. Every time.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_087<tab>And every time, when we'd get home, Mother would scold us, saying we'd catch our death walking around like that...
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_ALPHINAUD_000_088<tab>The pond was heated...
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_ALPHINAUD_000_089<tab>With a ceruleum-powered heater, by chance?
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_090<tab>I suppose it must have been... Come to think of it, I remember seeing engineers changing out a tank beneath a hatch...
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_091<tab>But that was a long time ago, when the water still flowed clear and wasn't this...brackish muck.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_092<tab>We can't see a thing, and I can't remember where the hatch might be.

TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_093<tab>With the machinery most likely broken, the amount of filth in there is probably the only reason it hasn't frozen over. I'd wager it's still unbearably cold, though.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_ALISAIE_000_094<tab>Jullus...what are your thoughts on magic?
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_095<tab>The average Garlean would jump out of their skin if they saw it. But the Ist has a few foreign signiferi and medici, so it doesn't scare me.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_ALISAIE_000_096<tab>Then I take it you won't mind if I employ a little now.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_ALISAIE_000_097<tab>Alphinaud, as you have a knack for finding dry wood, why don't you bring me some? Once that's done, a blast of Verfire should do the trick.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_ALPHINAUD_000_098<tab>Leave it to me!
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_099<tab>You're not planning to go in there, are you?
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_ALISAIE_000_100<tab>Of course I am. That tank isn't going to fetch itself.

TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_ALISAIE_000_101<tab>It's nothing so involved as extracting unprocessed ceruleum from a frozen lake like how the tappers do it. We're talking about a shallow pond in a park. And we have a way of warming ourselves up after.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_102<tab>But that's...insane!
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_ALISAIE_000_103<tab>So, fancy a dip?
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_Q1_000_104<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_A1_000_105<tab>A little friendly competition might make things interesting...
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_A1_000_106<tab>The last thing we need is you catching a cold.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_A1_000_107<tab>Step aside while I drink the pond dry! That way, we'll find it in no time!
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_ALISAIE_000_108<tab>Last one to find a ceruleum tank is a rotten egg! Though I daresay we'll both <var 1A 02 /var>smell<var 1A 01 /var> like rotten eggs when this is over...
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_ALISAIE_000_109<tab>If you're that concerned for my well-being, you can dive in and help me look! The quicker we find that ceruleum, the sooner we can get out of here.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_ALISAIE_000_110<tab>That may be the stupidest thing I've heard in a while! And that's saying something considering who my brother is.

TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_ALISAIE_000_111<tab>I can't fault your enthusiasm, though. Let's do it my way first, and if that doesn't work...perhaps <var 1A 02 /var>then<var 1A 01 /var> you can try your method. With Alphinaud's help.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_ALISAIE_000_120<tab>G-G-Gods be good, it's cold! Perhaps we sh-sh-should've listened to Jullus after all!
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_125<tab>I can't believe what I'm seeing...
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_SYSTEM_000_130<tab>You delve into the murky water but come up empty-handed. To add injury to insult, the icy wind on your damp clothing chills you to the bone...
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_SYSTEM_000_135<tab>Beneath the water, your fingers catch on what you think might be a handle...
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_SYSTEM_000_136<tab>You open the hatch and retrieve a ceruleum tank!

TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_SYSTEM_000_137<tab>However, your grand discovery comes at great personal cost, as you become acutely aware of the freezing cold and a rancid odor emanating from every ilm of your body. Jullus will doubtless feel compelled to pinch his nose shut when you deliver to him your prize...
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_ALISAIE_000_140<tab>You f-f-found it!? Hmph! There must be another one around here s-s-somewhere!
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_150<tab>Did you find anything? <sniff> <sniff> I hope you did...
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_151<tab>That's it!
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_152<tab>And there's still some ceruleum left!
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_153<tab>Ah, the fire's still not ready... Hold on, I'll give Alphinaud a hand!
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_ALISAIE_000_154<tab>Call me an Ul'dahn because by fire I am reborn...and my clothes are mostly dry now, too.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_155<tab>I appreciate you recovering the ceruleum, but I wish you'd taken the time to discuss the plan with me beforehand.

TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_156<tab>Despite the way you've been treated, in Lord Quintus's eyes, you're still envoys deserving of protection. If you were to die on my watch, he would be most displeased.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_ALISAIE_000_157<tab>Your concern is duly noted, but all's well that ends well.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_ALPHINAUD_000_158<tab>Jullus, you mentioned coming here with your younger siblings. Did you grow up in Garlemald?
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_159<tab>I did. Not far from here.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_160<tab>My father was an accomplished researcher in his youth, and for his contributions to the Empire awarded an estate. We lived well─better than many.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_ALISAIE_000_161<tab>What was Garlemald like in those days?
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_162<tab>...Everything. It was everything you could imagine...and so much more.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_163<tab>Even during the coldest winters, we always found warmth and comfort at home.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_164<tab>Coming in from the snow, taking off your coat and sitting down for a hot meal...with family...
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_165<tab>Visiting friends and relatives, receiving that same welcome. Knowing they had everything they needed.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_166<tab>Walking down the street, seeing the lights in all the houses, hearing the faint sounds of laughter and song. Of happiness...
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_167<tab>And although the summers came and went all too quickly, in that brief respite, the ice would melt and the forgotten grass make its triumphant return.
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_168<tab>Grey clouds gave way to blue skies. Some mornings, we'd climb to the top of the tallest building we could find to watch the sun rise...
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_169<tab>...Never again. Those rooftops are rubble. Those friends dead, and those memories... But if I could reclaim even a fraction of what we once had...
TEXT_AKTKMB111_04390_JULLUS_000_170<tab>Soon, our chance will come. We just need to hold on a little longer...
